## ScriptRegistry.fetchSource() method

Fetches raw source for a logical module id by probing known extensions.

Search order: - If `id` already ends with `.ts` or `.js` and is a file -<!-- -->&gt; return it. - Else try `.id.ts`<!-- -->, then `.id.js`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected fetchSource(id: string): Promise<{
        code: string;
        path: string;
        type: 'js' | 'ts';
        sourceMap?: string;
    } | undefined>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Logical module identifier (absolute or logical path-like).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ code: string; path: string; type: 'js' \| 'ts'; sourceMap?: string; } \| undefined&gt;

Source code, resolved path, and type (`'js' | 'ts'`<!-- -->), or `undefined` if not found.
